remarks: Properties of greatest lower bound of a poset.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
glbprop.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
glbprop.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
glbprop.u $e |- U = ( glb ` K ) $.
glbprop.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
glbprop.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. dom U ) $.
glbprop $p |- ( ph -> ( A. y e. S ( U ` S ) .<_ y /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. S z .<_ y -> z .<_ ( U ` S ) ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ y $.
$d B z $.
$d K y z $.
$d S y z $.
$d U y z $.
